website_summaries.verdict: For smaller spaces, this 24-inch option moves a lot of air.
pros: Sleek, modern lines paired with a practical and inexpensive fan
This is a good fan to use if you need multiple fans in the same space
cons: Not as much light as other fans and can get loud on the higher speeds

customer_reviews.title: Little fan, big power
customer_reviews.text: We bought bunk beds for our boys' bedroom to maximize floor space. However, once the bunk beds were set up, the current fan's blades were about a foot over and into the top bunk. Big problem, as my child and I both like his head intact. This fan got great reviews, and we are very pleased with it. We have the fan speed on medium, and you can feel the air blowing from any spot in the room. I read several reviews that the lights weren't bright enough, but we have no such complaint. It's plenty bright for their room-which is 10'5" x 12'10".
customer_reviews.author: LizBeth

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is small, but don't let that fool you. We installed this in our living room and we can feel it no matter where you sit, even when it's on low.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schoettle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little fans
customer_reviews.text: These little fans are really cool. We remodeled our kitchen and dining room and wanted something small and not overpowering for the 8ft ceilings in those rooms. The blades are only like 9in long but they really move some air. We haven't had to turn them any higher than medium. They have worked out great. One caveat... they ship with the direction set in reverse. Flip the direction switch before you turn it on or you will frown on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and small space fan.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, 9’6” ceilings, had a dead air space in kitchen, works great to move hot air out window or disperse cool air in galley 1950’s kitchen. Make sure you secure ceiling outlet box with a couple of extra nails, this secures fan so it doesn’t wiggle. The only noise I hear so far is wind whirl. Changed bulbs to LED. Works perfect for my small area to ventilate, definitely would not look good in larger space. 57 y/o F installer, by myself, even the electrical!
customer_reviews.author: STofMO

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Eh it was okay. Smaller than j imagined guess I should have measured. Literally the blade was hardly bigger than my hand. It’s small but if that’s what you are going for.. also don’t love that it take the tiny light bulb screw ins not regular size. Not standard bulbs. Bulbs they come with are yellowish so will have to replace. It’s okay should have been a little cheaper priced in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute little fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It goes great in my baby's nursery. Fair warning - it is very small, see picture attached. But it still puts out a good breeze, and the quality is very nice. It was easy to install, and doesn't wobble or make noise. Even if you intentionally angle it, it levels itself back out.
customer_reviews.author: meganmalia

customer_reviews.title: great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a nice fan. We purchased to put in my son's smaller bedroom. It does not come with a remote but has two metal ball strings to control the light and fan speed. Secures nicely to the ceiling. However there is tipping when you pull the string. We took it down and tried to figure out why. The shaft sits in a mount sort of like a ball joint with no securing screws. Hold on to the other string while changing speed or light. Again, overall nice little fan but the manufacturer could've improved the design.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan for very small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Poor instructions - read them through two or three times, before you start assembly (if you're using a wall switch for control, the instructions have you skip the part about attaching the fan blades). Fan is noisy (you shouldn't hear a ceiling fan "winding up"). However, it looks good, and was one of very few ceiling fans that would fit in the small space I have. It would be nice if they included LED bulbs, rather than incandescent. You can buy LED bulbs for this for about $6 to $10 each, depending on the color/warmth you want.
customer_reviews.author: Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Mine was faulty/grinding
customer_reviews.text: Spent the time to put it together and install. Turned the switch on and it started to slowly spin and then stopped with a grinding sound. Manually turned the blades and it would spin halfway around then come to a grinding stop, sounds like a bearing failed from the start. Very disappointing to put the work in to get it assembled and installed to have to remove it, take it apart to return.
customer_reviews.author: JK Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute little itty bitty fan!
customer_reviews.text: It bought this to place over my breakfast nook. I had a huge 48" fan there that was very intrusive. I knew this was small, but when I took this out of the box I was amazed at how small it is (small enough to install in a 3x3 hallway)....and a little worried that it wouldn't do anything for air movement. Super easy install and it only weight 11 lbs, I think. Hooked this baby up and it really does move some air. The light is nice and bright, but not too bright. I would recommend getting an LED bulb in this because the bulb sent does put out some heat. I love it and the color is unique.
customer_reviews.author: The Bearded Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Cute but terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this installed for about a year. right from the start it Makes a horrible grinding noise. Have disassembled and reassembled to check bearings and level, we got it to be quieter for a single day once. It won't stay balanced and constantly sounds like it is going to take off. Causes half the house to vibrate Don't waste your money, the internal parts on this are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lord

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I had to redo my ceiling and wanted a ceiling fan that worked well but was small for the space. This is perfect and beautiful. Very sleek look. I am in love my my choice and glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: T.Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Easy Seteup, Noisy and not well balanced
customer_reviews.text: I would probably not order this fan again. I did it for the style and size, but wish it wasn't so noisy. It does what I need it to, though. setup is fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Dieser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: We're remodeling our bathroom and I was determined to find a good quality fan to place above the whirlpool bathtub, went w my cherrywood vanity and oil rubbed bronze accessories, and was a good price deal. I searched and searched and could only find what I wanted in the $150-200+ range...then I saw this fan. I decided to take a chance and must say, it works perfectly! And it looks perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce's Nanna

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazzard??
customer_reviews.text: The fan is installed. It came with no installation instructions. I went on Home Depot and got the link . There are several points you will miss with out the instructions. Now it's installed and every other time I start it it just makes a grinding noice. Then on a second try it will start every time . Hmmm ???? The metal around the light unit gets VERY HOT. Think it might be a fire hazard . It's a shame because it's good looking for a small room. Not recommended, you get what you pay for 🤓
customer_reviews.author: Kaybee

customer_reviews.title: Not a quiet fan at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this more as a decor for the small front room than a functional fan. The only complaint is when you turn the fan on, it makes a humming sound, which makes you want to turn it off. The big fans I bought for the living room and bedroom makes 0 sounds when it is on. It looks great but the sound takes it way down the review for me. As small as it is, it should be completely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, super cute
customer_reviews.text: I am slowly replacing all the fans in my 1956 home - this fan is PERFECT for small rooms. Quiet, looks awesome, I bought it twice to keep things consistent. Fairly easy to install but you may need help from someone with small fingers. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: BAD lighting.. Cute but no light.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst light you can imagine. I even purchased a higher lumes in bulbs and my kitchen looks like I am in a closet. I have a small kitchen and this is probably the worst decision on amazon I made purchasing this ceiling fan.. Don't buy unless you can use it in your closet.You should know that these lights are 2 candelabra lights. 40 watts each..
customer_reviews.author: Jscichi

customer_reviews.title: Glass glove is made of very fragile glass.
customer_reviews.text: I would had given more stars but when I went to put the globe on it shattered. The glass of the globe is extremely thin and fragile. I would like for Amazon to replace this globe or I will have to contact the company to have it replaced because didn't put any pressure on the globe when it shattered but the fan itself is a beautiful piece for my sons room.
customer_reviews.author: Tijuana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to replace a plain dome light fixture at the top of a staircase. As I didn't have much clearance from the wall, I needed something with a small footprint. This fan fit the bill perfectly. The installation was a piece of cake, and it looks great. It also moves an impressive amount of air for it's size. Without any hesitation, I highly recommend this unit to anyone who wants a ceiling fan for a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small sized fan light.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small fan with a light for the upstairs landing. This one is perfect, quiet and does the trick. We had an electrician install it, took maybe 20 minutes from start to finish. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Needed circulation in my back hall area which is about 8' x 8' and has a step up. This fan is so small and the light is pretty bright. It also is a ceiling hugger so I am not worried about anyone hitting their head on it. It really pushes the air and is quiet (very quiet). Great product. Great price. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Neat little fan with light
customer_reviews.text: This little fan was just right for the kitchen area where it was placed, the light is bright enough and the fan on low puts out just enough air to help cool down the kitchen area when cooking. Fan was fairly easy to assemble and took about thirty minutes to put together with about 5 feet of extra wiring in case you need to drop if down some
customer_reviews.author: James E

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd fan. I had purchased one well over a year ago. I had it in my kitchen and decided to remodel the laundry room and moved it there. My laundry room has 2 lights so I added a 2nd one. Great quality and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: K R

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan, I installed this in place of a box light in a kitchen While it does not provide as much light as the halogen bulbs (4) that we had. It's enough light for what we need (we have some recessed lights in the area also) Fan went together easy, and wiring was simple. Puts off a lot of air, and is pretty quite.
customer_reviews.author: Kmagn13

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great little fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a little fan, have a long hall (40 in wide) that doesn't get much airflow. This was perfect, more than enough even on medium it really helps move the air and cool it down. Fan is a bit wobbly in high, but most are. Very surprised in the overall quality. Congress with very long wires, should you need a longer down rod, and a few extra parts - I love when manufacturers do that!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Flow
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this fan for my son's Spider-Man bedroom. Nice, sleek, industrial look that I was going for. I was concerned about it's tiny size but man can this little fan push some air! I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small fan to fit on a tight sloped ceiling. It's quiet, looks good to me and moves a decent amount of air. Having been using for a few weeks now with no issues. Only complaint as others have mentioned is the lights are not super bright. For the price you really can't beat it. Install was as simple as these things get.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little fan. We installed it in a screened in porch (8x12 ft) and it moves enough air to be comfortable but not overpowering. Assembly of the blades took a bit of time and installation was fairly easy, it was done in under an hour. Would recommend for that kind of setting (outdoor or porch, small room).
customer_reviews.author: -ah-

customer_reviews.title: I'm kinda cute but a lil POS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my small kitchen. I'm usually pleased with my purchases after researching and reviewing but to be blunt, this fan is a little POS. Lights went out quickly and went to replace and the bulb coil part got stuck. Got it out the first time, but not quite as lucky the 2nd time it happened. Additionally, the globe is incredibly fragile, breaking the first time I unscrewed ot to replace the bulbs. Save your hard earned dollars, kids!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna B.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!  Bad item
customer_reviews.text: Requested refund, denied. Told to disassemble, refused after hours of assemble to disassemble. Sorry I purchased in good faith. Bad order. lost me as a customer. Spent hrs assembling & last blade would not line up & lock did not secure vibration, broke, shattered, glass mess to clean. Requested full refund without disassemble. Credit me in full or I leave the review. Total waste of my time. Out 107.00 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Tate

customer_reviews.title: Fine but would rather it not wobble
customer_reviews.text: I like this small fan and light very much it is slick . However no matter how we try there is still a wobble in this and we have tried and tried to rebalance this and have given it time to allocate to the space . This Fan is in an office , so its not a huge issue but if it is used in a bedroom it would drive the occupant crazy.
customer_reviews.author: DEA & ASSOC Inc

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for its price point.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very quiet and works great with my son's loft bed. We needed something small that he wouldn't hit his head on. The gunmetal looks great in his room. Ours did not come with a remote but I'm not completely sure it was supposed to. It works great for the price point but it's definitely not the mist high-end fan you could buy.
customer_reviews.author: knielson85

customer_reviews.title: 1 fan only worked for 4 weeks @
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and have been using them for about 6 weeks. They both started out great, but after 1 month one of the fans is having motor issues. We switch it on and nothing happens, then gradually it slowly moves, gradually increasing speed... They company only allows 30 day returns. It took us a while to have an electrician to hang it and now it barely works. Frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Marylee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice fan/light combo
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for our bonus room and they are really nice. Great light and the air flow is awesome. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lindach

customer_reviews.title: Have not unboxed it yet as it will be a warmer weather project for an outside screened porch which is pretty small. Looks like it will be just what ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it today, packaged well. Have not unboxed it yet as it will be a warmer weather project for an outside screened porch which is pretty small. Looks like it will be just what we needed for such an area and we like all of the options. Also was a better price than local home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking powerful little fan.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It looks great. It's pretty powerful even on the medium setting. Fairly easy to put together. Cons: It's one noisy little sucker. Was a little difficult to get it balanced. The highest setting is still a bit too loud and wobbly after 24 hours. The light isn't all that bright. Overall it was worth the money. It was super loud at first, but after running for 24 hours it's better, and it has a pretty short range, which is expected for the short blades.
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking....Not So Functional
customer_reviews.text: Fan looks great, easy to assemble and install, the blades are not great quality. I bought this fan for a small den that didn't need a lot of air movement. I previously had a 4 blade that was just a little bigger but worked great. The problem with the old fan was it was a little dated. This new fan does not work very well even with the small room and even with the two lights it doesn't put out much light.
customer_reviews.author: perfectshot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Air Displacement
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little fan! Man.... the air this thing displaces is incredible! Looks great in a kitchen or small room. Very impressed with the quality. Took about 1 hour to install. I had to add the ceiling box also.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Delapena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my dinning room and it’s great. Gives a nice cool breeze. I totally recommend this fan. The only issue is sine my husband doesn’t know his own strength he broke the light bulb and now I can’t find a replacement. Any ideas are welcome. Oh tried to look at manufacturers web site already no bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy but good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Compact and useful. I will probably change out the lightbulb because this one is dim and yellowish. We put it at the top of stairs to help with air flow and it seems to be doing okay thus far. Slight clicking noise when it was first installed that has since gone away.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Small fan, big air movement
customer_reviews.text: This tiny fan packs a punch for its size and the light kit is fairly decent as far as lumeniscence goes. We installed this to use in a room with a bunk bed so the fan wouldn’t look someone’s head off on the top bunk. It works great and is perfect for a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jo.King.

customer_reviews.title: love my lil power house
customer_reviews.text: I decided to install it myself and it was very easy. I installed the fan in our bedroom and I replaced the light with the LED light. We love our little powerhouse. The fan is super efficient and has so many different settings and it's pretty strong. I love how sturdy it is and how it doesn't shake and it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald T. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Fan is really cute but better for kids' room
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really really small and cute but it will be more apt for kids' room. There is a good level of fan speed even though the leaves are small.
customer_reviews.author: Rabh

customer_reviews.title: Its ok might not be for evryone
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok fan. If the room is small its very effective. In a larger room it moves air but cant feel it beyond fan blades.
customer_reviews.author: THE MINISTA

customer_reviews.title: Modern fan that puts out the air
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little modern fan that really puts out the wind. I have it in my office!
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I'd Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful small fan. I purchased 2 to replace old & bigger white fans in two small bedrooms. They put out a lot of air for their size. They operate quietly & look perfect for the size of my rooms. The gun metal finish is beautiful! They were easy to install. There were 2 small 40w bulbs included which was more light than I wanted, plus they got very hot so I will be replacing those with energy efficient cooler bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E. Coogan

customer_reviews.title: Love our little fan
customer_reviews.text: We had this professionally installed and love it. It gives off plenty of air ,especially for the half bath we put it in. And it looks pretty classy.
customer_reviews.author: W. E. BAKER

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great power for small fan. Pushes a large amount of air. Really nice in small room or hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Selenashy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous fan
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and really powerful little fan. My ceiling looks 5 feet higher.
customer_reviews.author: Stranger

customer_reviews.title: Cute Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Cute fan! As the other reviewers stated, this fan is little, but it does move a lot of air. I am thinking of buying another one for my upstairs landing area. It's the only fan I've ever seen that would fit there or in a hallway. Finish is nice, too!
customer_reviews.author: Desdemona

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We just installed them a couple of days ago. All in all, installation went well. I like the look and am happy with the noise level and movement of air.
customer_reviews.author: HTC One Case Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for small space
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a small sun porch. I had a hard time finding something that would be the right size and have a light. This fits perfectly. It is also attractive. It ran all fall and winter with no problems. The only thing I don't like is that it wobbles a bit, even on low, which is a little distracting. Overall, I am very happy with this fan and light.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: No problems. We have an older home, and needed a small ceiling fan for an upstairs bedroom. After a small modification to the support plate, Installation went very well. Great price, nice design and a quiet fan. So far, very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GMan

customer_reviews.title: good but too small
customer_reviews.text: this is a well made / cute / modern design ceiling fan. 3 speed fan works well but somewhat low on coverage and density of air simply because of small blades. the only downside is that these fans are really small. literally 24 inches diameter. if you're looking for more powerful air flow, get something else as this is for very small room or narrow hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kim

customer_reviews.title: Really wouldn't even adequately cool down a 200sf room in February in Phoenix
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as some reviewers stated it was. Really wouldn't even adequately cool down a 200sf room in February in Phoenix. Spend another $30 and get a bigger fan. This would be good for maybe a laundry room or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: johnny prescott

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the money!! Looks good, and it's really quiet. For a small fan, it really puts out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Small Fan for a Tight Spot
customer_reviews.text: Good fan, fits in a tight space (bathroom). I just wish it could throw more air... maybe metal blades would help? Also this uses candelabra bulbs so make sure you find LED versions of that too... (one of the bulbs in mine was broken, but I wasn't going to use incandescent anyway).
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan for a small space! Love the gunmetal finish!
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: For being small it sure has a kick in the fan!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than anticipated , but it’s just the right size for my small sunroom! The all black accents my black and torquoise colors
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Seys

customer_reviews.title: it is useless as it does not direct any significant airflow in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan in Feb 2017 for small bathroom. Frankly..... it is useless as it does not direct any significant airflow in either up or down mode. The blades are too short and it is Not well balanced as it shakes a lot. Should have gone for 36 “ blades
customer_reviews.author: Jan Davey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a fan small enough for my laundry area at my local big box stores, so went online. Was excited to find this one but nervous about what it may be when it arrived. There was no need to be nervous, it is perfect! Wasn't too hard to install where a light fixture had been. It is very sturdy, good looking and quiet...also the perfect size for my need. If you need a small fan, please don't hesitate to order this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Wish had a remote also wish it didn’t have frosted lighted cover great fan for size
customer_reviews.author: michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Not sure the people that listed reviews actually got this fan. Can't even tell the fan is in the room except for about a 2 foot area immediately underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Little Fan
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The fan moves air, provides light, and easy on the eyes. The gun metal gray fan looks wonderful over our dining room table. Installation was done by an electrician. No wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: bruno90068

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a room over the garage with a slanted ceiling that won't fit a normal sized fan.
customer_reviews.author: LQ13

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and easy to install. And they move the air, with just the perfect amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: William Gibson

customer_reviews.title: It works great, and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this is a small sized ceiling fan. It works great, and it looks good. I have it installed on a vaulted ceiling with no issues. 4 star, is because it comes with traditional bulbs instead of LED.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: No remote control But great product. It would be nice to receive the remote control.
customer_reviews.text: No remote control. It was easy to install extremely quiet. Love it. Would love to have the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the breezeway
customer_reviews.text: great little guy! Installed in our enclosed breezeway. It does just what we needed, really circulates the air very well. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I like the added touch of the light and fan pulls ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a ceiling fan for my small kitchen and this works perfectly. It has a clean modern look. The fan runs quietly and produces a lot of wind for such a small fan. I like the added touch of the light and fan pulls being marked. Installation seemed to be about the way every ceiling fan installation goes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Elma

customer_reviews.title: ITS THE PERFECT SIZE FOR THE ROOM I NEEDED IT FOR
customer_reviews.text: ITS THE PERFECT SIZE FOR THE ROOM I NEEDED IT FOR. IT VERY CLASSY LOOKING AND THE FAN IS VERY POWERFUL. ONLY THING THE LIGHT IS KIND OF DULL AND YOU NEED A SMALL LIGHTBULB.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the most adorable little fan i have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the most adorable little fan i have ever seen. I got the brightest LED lights I could find for it and still very dim.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, and Im happy with it so far. Ive seen other reviews of it losing the black finish on the fan blades. Havnt noticed anything coming lose on mine atleast yet. Also seen reviews of people complaining it moves around too much or rocks when on. Mine doesnt move at all. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my small kitchen which doesn't have a window. Works just fine and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Joe Red

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this tiny fan for my back porch remodel! Puts off a lot of air, surprisingly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute but SMALL....... we run it on medium because High Speed it make a clicking noise......
customer_reviews.author: A.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan looks good, runs well.
customer_reviews.text: Like my fan alot. It is a two person job for sure. Great style. Don't care for the remote as you have to wire it on to the system. I thought the remote is like a TV remote- just put the battery in and go; SO NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lin

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these ceiling fans. Our rooms have low ceilings and these are small fans. They are quiet and they move air but do not push it at you. Some ceiling fans blow air down these quietly move air around. The light gives off light. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Willamsburger

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous little fans
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous little fans, remodeling our kitchen and I bought 2 of these to place on wach end of the ceiling over one large one in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but complicated to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but complicated to install. Fan motor hums when turning. Limited in light bulb selection due to size of opening. Cannot recommend. Would have gone with Hunter but needed short fan blades for room with a loft bed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Walock

customer_reviews.title: Tiny fan, big ambitions
customer_reviews.text: Everyone comments on how cute this little fan is with its tiny blades. It definitely gets attention and shocks with the amount of air output. Would buy again if I needed another fan for a smaller space!
customer_reviews.author: kris buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Small d and so cute. Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: It is great to use in hallways. We use it to keep warm air flowing from living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. Have it in a small room and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this fan
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this fan!! Always hesitant when purchasing without the visual !! If you do have a low ceiling and a tight spot this fan does the job! Mine is installed at top of stairs in a little hallway and this fan moves the air with no fears of getting your head chopped off if and I think a person 6 ft would be safe! Pull chains are accessible and work well for peeps who are vertically challenge like myself!!! Another bonus for the ladies is the fan was a surprise honey doo item....was installed by then time I came home from work with no whining!!! I would buy another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two fans for a 10X20 den. Fans are very good looking but it ends there! Fans are very noisy at any speed, sound like an old bathroom fan grinding away. One fan will not turn fan blades at all when on low speed and powered on from wall switch. I'm considering returning them.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful fan- It is small but it’s perfect for our ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan- It is small but it’s perfect for our space- We put it in our bathroom above our jacuzzi tub- Very well put together and easy install
customer_reviews.author: katie marie sieg

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect. But could be.
customer_reviews.text: The fan was very nice but the globe showed up with a little crack in it. I thought I could turn it so it would show but after running he fan for a couple minutes to test it out it had cracked the whole way across. If I could have just a globe sent to me to replace the cracked one it would be excellent. Until then 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: nice design but
customer_reviews.text: ridiculously tiny. I mean, I was looking for a small fan but this looked plain goofy small
customer_reviews.author: shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Light cover broke
customer_reviews.text: Great light fan blows great Glass cover broke upon installation Should be plastic I will need a replacement of some Plastic would be wiser
customer_reviews.author: Connie Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Cute little ceiling fan. Has a little wobble to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little ceiling fan. Has a little wobble to it and not as quiet as my other fans, but is works. I am a qualified electrician, so box installed correctly and secure - blades are not balanced as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: George L Paul

customer_reviews.title: Parts not includes!!
customer_reviews.text: All the parts were not in the box. We can't even hang it up.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and good looking. Creates a more than adequate air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Dahlen

customer_reviews.title: The fan will not securely operate, when I pull ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan will not securely operate, when I pull the chain it moves so much the blades touch the ceiling, seems that something has to be missing or broke with this one. Is anyone else having the same problem?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Visually these things are great. But the assembly process is nuts. I would easily pay an additional twenty dollars to get this assembled.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE BRADLEY

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 of the 3 holes lined up on the blades and blade brackets making it completely useless. Thought this would be the perfect small fan for the vaulted ceiling we needed it for. Irritated and the only way to contact customer service is via email. No one to actually speak to until they contact you. Disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cool little fan
customer_reviews.text: This thing puts out a lot of wind for such a small fan and it is supriseningly quiet. The only down side is the lights are not very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Small, perfect for closet or very small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great small fans, installed two of them in closet. Great!
customer_reviews.author: SPF2112

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our small bedroom . It pushes the air around nicely. I'd definately buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worse purchase! !
customer_reviews.text: I received the lamp broken and contacted the supplier and they didnt acknowledged me. After installing the fan with as is, it stopped working after 2 weeks!! ridiculous smh
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 7224300 Quince 24-Inch Gun Metal Indoor Ceiling Fan, Light Kit with Opal Frosted Glass
product_meta.description:
Color:Gun Metal

Add comfort to your home with this Westinghouse Quince Two-Light 24-Inch Reversible Six-Blade Indoor Ceiling Fan. With a sleek gun metal finish, reversible black/graphite blades, and opal frosted glass shade, this ceiling fan will provide a casual focal point for any small-size room.

Ideal for rooms up to 80 square feet (8 by 10 feet) with standard 8-foot ceilings, this fan features a 153-by-9-millimeter silicon steel motor with dual capacitor. Three fan speeds (high/medium/low) and a reversible switch help keep you comfortable. In warm weather, you can run the ceiling fan counterclockwise to stay cool. In cold weather, you can run it clockwise to recirculate warm air from the ceiling and eliminate cold spots and drafts. The Quince is remote control adaptable for added convenience.

The fan provides airflow of up to 1,270 cubic feet per minute (cfm). It is rated to operate at 25 watts at high speed (without the lights), which gives it an airflow efficiency rating of 39 cfm per watt. (As a comparison, 36- to 48-inch ceiling fans have airflow efficiencies ranging from approximately 71 to 86 cfm per watt at high speed.)

This Westinghouse ceiling fan is backed by a lifetime motor warranty and a two-year warranty on all other parts. Product reference number 72243.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Add comfort to your home with this Westinghouse Lighting Quince Two-Light 24-Inch Reversible Six-Blade Indoor Ceiling Fan. With a sleek gun metal finish, reversible black/graphite blades, and opal frosted glass shade, this ceiling fan will provide a contemporary focal point for any small-size room. Ideal for rooms up to 80 square feet (8 by 10 feet) with standard 8-foot ceilings, this fan features a 153-by-9-millimeter silicon steel motor with dual capacitor. Three fan speeds (high/medium/low) and a reversible switch help keep you comfortable. In warm weather, you can run the ceiling fan counterclockwise to stay cool. In cold weather, you can run it clockwise to recirculate warm air from the ceiling and eliminate cold spots and drafts. The Quince is remote control adaptable for added convenience. The fan provides airflow of up to 1,270 cubic feet per minute (cfm). It is rated to operate at 25 watts at high speed (without the lights), which gives it an airflow efficiency rating of 39 cfm per watt. This Westinghouse Lighting ceiling fan is backed by a lifetime motor warranty and a two-year warranty on all other parts. What's in the Box Quince indoor ceiling fan, 78-inch lead wire, 4-inch length by 3/4-inch diameter down rod, and two candelabra-base 40-watt G16-1/2 light bulbs.
feature_bullets: Two-light 24-inch reversible six-blade indoor ceiling fan for rooms up to 80 square feet (8 by 10 feet)
153-by-9-millimeter silicon steel motor with dual capacitor; three fan speeds (high/medium/low); reversible switch for year-round use
Airflow: 1, 270 cfm; Energy Usage: 25 watts without light; Airflow Efficiency: 39 cfm per watt.
Includes 3/4-inch by 4-inch down rod, 78-inch lead wire, and two candelabra-base 40-watt G16-1/2 light bulbs
Lifetime on motor; two-year on all other parts
